mapper.select: select b.no as no, b.user_no as user_no, a.name as user_name, b.title as title, b.contents as contents, b.hit as hit, b.reg_date as reg_date, b.group_no as group_no, b.order_no as order_no, b.depth as depth from board b, user a where b.user_no = a.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc limit #{pageNum }, 10
select no, user_no, title, contents, group_no, order_no, depth, hit from board where no=#{contentNo}
mapper.update: update board set hit= hit+1 where no=#{contentNo}
mapper.select: select group_no, order_no, depth from board where no=#{contentNo}
mapper.delete: delete b from board b join user a on b.user_no=a.no where b.no=#{contentNo} and a.password=#{password}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, reg_date=now() where no=#{no}
update board set order_no=order_no+1 where order_no >= #{orderNo}
